title: Description of frictional forces exerted on box

content.description: A 20 kg box moving at an initial speed of 10 m/s slides 25 m to the right on a horizontal floor before it comes to a complete stop.
content.question: Which of the following best describes the frictional forces exerted on the box and on the floor while the box is sliding?

choices.label:
Box
 Floor

To the right
 To the right

Box
 Floor

To the right
 To the left

Box
 Floor

To the left
 None

Box
 Floor

To the left
 To the right

content.answer:
Box
 Floor

To the left
 To the right

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
